query: Check the full-year EBITDA values between the IPO prospectus and the Annual report. Do they match?
expected_answer: Yes, from the values provided, the EBITDA values for 2019 are consistent.
output:
They do not match.

- Prospectus (approved 12 Oct 2020): for the year ended 31 Dec 2019 Adjusted EBITDA = NOK 307.5 million (see Section 10.7.1 and the reconciliation under “Non‑IFRS financial measures”).
- Annual report 2020 (consolidated financials for year ended 31 Dec 2020): the reconciliation in note 6 (segment reporting) shows Adjusted EBITDA for year 2019 = NOK 307.941 million (presented as 307,941) — effectively NOK 307.9 million.

Difference: NOK 0.4 million (307.9 − 307.5 ≈ 0.4), i.e. a small rounding/presentation difference.
